title: Lida93
author: Lida93
content: In today's world, the social media has open possibilities of ways through which anyone in any part of the world irrespective of gender or race can make money through their talent. From tiktok, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter etc. A character/behavior which three decades ago we would have characterized as a useless way of behaving, is now what people use all over the world is using to cause traffic and making a living on social media.Away from that, we also now have a digital space where digital currency is gradually taking centre stage penetrating and gaining some dominance into different facet of the human economy, creating wealth and building bridges of esay transaction through it's trust-system in a well secure way.Hitherto to this time, non of the above mentioned source of means of earns meet and wealth creation was visible as it is today. This profound technological breakthroughs of source of wealth creation in human existence only clears the air that greater advanced inventory as these would evolve, which begs the question of when and what are your expectations?what are your own very opinion, ideas or expectation

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: The internet is a connection of devices and it was predicted in the past by a man Â (unknown to me) but, not Nostrademus, that 5000 devices will be interconnected to each other, which birthed the initiative of the internet in this century. Aside from the already known emerging technologies like metaverse, web3 and NFTs. I see an internet that'll keep more people in the house, reduce vehicles on the streets, bring cost down, and make the people of this world begin to have moneyAll things considered, to stay safe, they should be a way for the internet to power Electricity. Since they is no internet without electricity. I'd say it's an incomplete technology.

comments.author: odolvlobo
comments.body: I don't think you can consider cryptocurrencies as a source of wealth creation because their worth has not yet been proven. Cryptocurrencies may prove their worth in the future by creating actual wealth, but we are not there yet, and it also may never happen.Many people have become wealthy due to cryptocurrencies, but I consider this wealth to be borrowed and not created.

comments.author: hatshepsut93
comments.body: Wealth is not money, if you are printing money you are not creating wealth. If you are creating cryptocurrencies you are not creating wealth. Wealth is goods and services. And crypto isn't good at creating them. How many jobs did crypto create? Some thousands of exchange employees, and some developers, writers, promoters here and there. Not enough to matter on a global scale. And most of the world is not using crypto, because people don't feel the need and benefits in doing so. So in terms of global trends and economy, crypto is a very small thing, despite existing for well over a decade.

comments.author: coupable
comments.created_time: November 13, 2022, 11:45:48 PMLast edit: November 17, 2022, 09:17:12 PM by coupable
comments.body: Crypto is not wealth in itself, but a means to achieve wealth. Despite this, unfortunately, it is not supported by all areas of goods and services. Traders and currency traders, who are fortunate to become rich from their activities promote the theory that crypto is the source of their wealth and not other factors. While the truth is that luck cannot be relied upon while launching projects. There are many safe investments that can achieve huge returns compared to crypto. Most of the investors in crypto are from countries where the fields of investment are limited, so they do not hesitate to venture.

comments.author: davis196
comments.body: 1.Digital currencies(I guess you mean cryptocurrencies) cannot create wealth out of thin air. They redistribute wealth across the crypto traders/investors. Crypto trading/investing is a zero sum game, which cannot create wealth by itself.2. The social media influencers don't make money directly from the social media platforms(even thought Tik Tok has such feature). They use the social media platforms to gather a following and build an army of fans. Later on, they monetize that army of fans via different ways, like selling merch or using services like Patreon.Technology can't create wealth by itself. You can use technology in a clever way to build your wealth, but the technology itself isn't the main wealth creator.

comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Quote from: Lida93 on November 13, 2022, 03:57:18 PMIn today's world, the social media has open possibilities of ways through which anyone in any part of the world irrespective of gender or race can make money through their talent. From tiktok, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter etc. A character/behavior which three decades ago we would have characterized as a useless way of behaving, is now what people use all over the world is using to cause traffic and making a living on social media.Before now in my country it was only politicians, businessmen and their cronies are the super-rich but the social media have given more people access to money. Currently the social media have helped to promote skills and talents that have brought unknown individuals to the limelight suddenly. The social media have broken the barrier of race, sex or social status because everyone is given equal access to showcase their good or services.Â QuoteAway from that, we also now have a digital space where digital currency is gradually taking centre stage penetrating and gaining some dominance into different facet of the human economy, creating wealth and building bridges of esay transaction through it's trust-system in a well secure way.The crytospace especially bitcoin have become a vital instrument to escape from the control of greedy and manipulative financial institutions and government. It has made financial transaction smooth, private and easy. Some people have also been fortunate to make good amount of money from this sector. But so many fake and fraudulent actors in the crypto industry have been discrediting the sector with their get-rich- quick-scheme offers and sharp fraudulent practices. Â  Â QuoteHitherto to this time, non of the above mentioned source of means of earns meet and wealth creation was visible as it is today. This profound technological breakthroughs of source of wealth creation in human existence only clears the air that greater advanced inventory as these would evolve, which begs the question of when and what are your expectations?There would be more technological advancement that would make the social media a viable avenue to make money easily. And the cryto industry would keep evolving and more opportunities would keep erupting. But it is important to state that this technological development would not be a win-win situation because it will also comes with its own problems and demerits. Social media crimes like misinformation, stealing of identity and hacking of account would also increase in the nearest future. More shitcoins would be invented that would lead to fraud, invasion of privacy and loss of funds. More crypto exchange firms would still engage in sharp practices and try to cover up their failures through manipulations.
